text: I spent two decades in the corporate world working across operations, project management, sales, marketing and commercial roles, managing diverse and senior teams, in multinational environments. Driven by curiosity and impact, I pivoted into Data Science, earning an MSc in Data Analytics from the University of Glasgow in the UK.
Today, I design and build analytics solutions, data‑driven applications, and software systems that support real decisions — not dashboards that gather dust.
My wide network will help you not only in building data solutions, but also in navigating the complex landscape of business and technology.

After two decades in corporate world (SLB) working in the field, operations management, project management, sales, marketing and commercial roles, managing multinational & multicultural teams and environments, I pivoted to Data Science. I graduated with an MSc in Data Analytics from the University of Glasgow in the UK and have been a self-taught software developer.

Driven by curiosity and impact, I am passionate about using data and technology to solve real-world problems and drive business growth, leveraging my experience working in diverse environments to bridge plan & execution.
My professional network built through 25 years will help you not only in building data solutions, but also in navigating the complex landscape of business and technology.
